properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Southern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 17 at 4:07PM AST until February 19 at 8:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Hazardous marine conditions are expected to continue through
the workweek...

.A northerly swell with enhanced winds is resulting in hazardous
that will persist through at least mid-week. Most of our local
waters will be impacted by the seas generated by the winds.
Atlantic waters and passages will be impacted by the swell from
the north.

* WHAT...Seas 5 to 7 feet with east winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts
up to 30 kt.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Southern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 PM Tuesday to 8 PM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM TUESDAY TO 8 PM AST WEDNESDAY
